net.darmo_creations.utils

Class I18n

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.darmo_creations.utils.I18n

  • public final class I18n
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles internationalization. Language files should be named 'LOCALE.lang' with LOCALE being the locale's code (e.g.: en_US.lang).
    Author:
    Damien Vergnet

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(java.lang.String path,
                        java.util.Locale locale)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the preferred locale.
        This method must be called before any other from this class.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the language files
        locale - the locale
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the lang file cannot be openned

      • getFormattedDate

        public static java.lang.String getFormattedDate(java.lang.String year,
                                                java.lang.String month,
                                                java.lang.String day)
        Returns a formatted dated with the localized date pattern. Formatting tags are the following:
        • Y - the year on 4 digits; leading zeroes are added if necessary
        • M - the month on 2 digits; leading zeroes are added if necessary
        • D - the day of the month on 2 digits; leading zeroes are added if necessary
        • y - the year without leading zeroes
        • m - the month without leading zeroes
        • d - the day of the month without leading zeroes
        Parameters:
        year - the year
        month - the month
        day - the day of the month
        Returns:
        the formatted date

      • getLocalizedString

        public static java.lang.String getLocalizedString(java.lang.String unlocalizedString)
        Returns the localized string corresponding to the given key. If no key was found, the key is returned.
        Parameters:
        unlocalizedString - the unlocalized string
        Returns:
        the localized string

      • getLocalizedWord

        public static java.lang.String getLocalizedWord(java.lang.String unlocalizedWord,
                                                boolean feminine,
                                                boolean plural)
        Returns the localized word corresponding to the given key. If no key was found, the key is returned. No need to specify "word." at the beginning.
        Parameters:
        unlocalizedWord - the unlocalized word
        feminine - if true, the feminine will be returned
        plural - if true, the plural will be returned
        Returns:
        the localized word

      • getLocalizedMnemonic

        public static char getLocalizedMnemonic(java.lang.String unlocalizedString)
        Returns the localized mnemonic for the given key. If no key was found, '\0' (null character) will be returned. No need to specify ".mnemonic" in the key.
        Parameters:
        unlocalizedString - the key
        Returns:
        the localized mnemonic

      • toTitleCase

        public static java.lang.String toTitleCase(java.lang.String input)
        Converts the given string to title case.
        Parameters:
        input - the string
        Returns:
        the string in title case
